subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Pierre Bordry, the president of France’s anti-doping agency, said Floyd Landis’s admission of doping was a result of the pressure the authorities put on him.
snippet: Pierre Bordry, the president of France’s anti-doping agency, said Floyd Landis’s admission of doping was a result of the pressure the authorities put on him.
